      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClusterState ClusterStateContext.getClusterState()
      Fetches the latest snapshot of the cluster state.
      Methods in org.corfudb.infrastructure.management with parameters of type ClusterState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<String> FullyConnectedClusterRecommendationEngine.failedServers(ClusterState clusterState, Layout layout)
      Provides list of servers from a given layout(epoch) that this implementation of FULLY_CONNECTED_CLUSTER algorithm has determined as failed.
      List<String> ClusterRecommendationEngine.failedServers(ClusterState clusterStatus, Layout layout)
      Provide a list of servers in the Corfu cluster which according to the underlying algorithm for ClusterRecommendationStrategy have failed.
      List<String> FullyConnectedClusterRecommendationEngine.healedServers(ClusterState clusterState, Layout layout)
      Provide a list of servers considered to have healed in the Corfu cluster according to the FULLY_CONNECTED_CLUSTER implementation of algorithm for ClusterRecommendationStrategy.
      List<String> ClusterRecommendationEngine.healedServers(ClusterState clusterStatus, Layout layout)
      Provide a list of servers in the Corfu cluster which according to the underlying algorithm for ClusterRecommendationStrategy have healed.
      void ClusterStateContext.updateNodeState(ClusterState clusterState, Layout currentLayout)
      Updates the cluster view based on another cluster view received in the heartbeat response.
